title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements. Conduct market research, gather user feedback, and document functional and non-functional requirements.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components for 3D modeling, AR integration, sizing algorithms (with a focus on accuracy and diversity of clothing types), recommendation engine, data storage, and scalability considerations. The design should also incorporate security measures, ensure seamless user experience, and consider possible future integrations such as VR or AI. Additionally, suggest modularization strategies for easy maintenance and future enhancements. Include a roadmap for each component's implementation.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema to store product data, user profiles, and other relevant information.

title: 3D Modeling and AR Integration
description: Develop the 3D modeling and AR components to render realistic virtual try-on experiences.

title: Sizing and Recommendation Engine
description: Implement algorithms and machine learning models for accurate size recommendations and personalized style suggestions.

title: User Interface and Experience Design
description: Design and develop the user interface and overall user experience for the virtual fitting room application.

title: Security and Privacy Considerations
description: Implement security measures to protect user data and ensure privacy compliance with relevant regulations.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop comprehensive test plans and execute testing strategies to ensure the application meets quality standards and requirements.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure, continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and monitoring systems.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation, user guides, and support resources for the virtual fitting room application.
